labelFormatType.description:
Specify the label Format Type.
click here to see label format types

labelOrder.description: This is the order of the Shipping label/documents to be generated.

maskedData.description:
Specify which data/sections on the label to be masked.
Note:
  • SECONDARY_BARCODE – This is used for Smartpost shipment labels.
  • SHIPPER_INFORMATION – This is used for Third Party Consignee, Intra-UK shipments.
  • TOTAL_WEIGHT – This replaces the Total weight with Actual Weight in Master label and AWB copies.

regulatoryLabels.description: Specify how the regulatory details to be provided on the labels.

generationOptions.description: Specify the regulatory content preference to be displayed on the label.

type.description: Specify the type of regulatory content to be added on the label.

additionalLabels.description: Specify how the additional details to be provided on the labels.

type.description: Specify the type of additional  details to be added on the label.

count.description: Specifies the count of label to return.

docTabContentType.description: Indicates the content type of the doc tab.

docTabZoneSpecifications.description: Indicate the doc tab specifications for the individual doc tab zone on the label.

zoneNumber.description:
It is a non-negative integer that represents the portion of doc-tab in a label.
Example: 1

header.description:
Indicates the parameter name in the header for the doc tab zone.
Example: WHT

dataField.description:
Indicate the path request/reply element to be printed on doc tab.
Example:
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/ShipTimestamp
  • REQUEST/PACKAGE/weight/Value
  • REQUEST/PACKAGE/InsuredValue/Amount
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/SpecialServicesRequested/CodDetail/CodCollectionAmount/Amount
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/Shipper/Address/StreetLines[1]
  • CLIENT/MeterNumber
  • TRANSACTION/CustomerTransactionId
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/TotalWeight/Value
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/ShipTimestamp
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/Recipient/Contact/PersonName
  • REPLY/SHIPMENT/OperationalDetail/DeliveryDate
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/BaseCharge/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/TotalFreightDiscounts/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/TotalSurcharges/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/NetCharge/AmountREPLY
  • /SHIPMENT/RATES/PAYOR_ACCOUNT/TotalSurcharges/Amount

literalValue.description: Indicates the actual data to be printed in the label

justification.description: Indicates the justification format for the string.

items.description: Indicates the doc tab zone specification.

zone001.description: Indicate the doc tab specification for different zones on the label. The specification includes zone number, header and data field to be displayed on the label.

symbology.description: Indicates the type of barcode symbology used on FedEx documents and labels.

zoneNumber.description:
It is a non-negative integer that represents the portion of doc-tab in a label.
Example: 1

header.description:
Indicates the parameter name in the header for the doc tab zone.
Example: WHT

dataField.description:
Indicate the path request/reply element to be printed on doc tab.
Example:
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/ShipTimestamp
  • REQUEST/PACKAGE/weight/Value
  • REQUEST/PACKAGE/InsuredValue/Amount
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/SpecialServicesRequested/CodDetail/CodCollectionAmount/Amount
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/Shipper/Address/StreetLines[1]
  • CLIENT/MeterNumber
  • TRANSACTION/CustomerTransactionId
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/TotalWeight/Value
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/ShipTimestamp
  • REQUEST/SHIPMENT/Recipient/Contact/PersonName
  • REPLY/SHIPMENT/OperationalDetail/DeliveryDate
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/BaseCharge/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/TotalFreightDiscounts/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/TotalSurcharges/Amount
  • REPLY/PACKAGE/RATE/ACTUAL/NetCharge/AmountREPLY
  • /SHIPMENT/RATES/PAYOR_ACCOUNT/TotalSurcharges/Amount

literalValue.description: Indicates the actual data to be printed in the label

justification.description: Indicates the justification format for the string.

specification.description: Indicates the doc tab zone specification.

barcoded.description: It is a doc tab content type which is in barcoded format.

docTabContent.description: Specifies details of doc tab content.

customerSpecifiedDetail.description: This object allows the control of label content for customization.

personName.description:
Specify contact person name.
Recommended length is 70.
Note: There's no specific validation for the person name.
Example: John Taylor

emailAddress.description:
Specify contact email address. Maximum length is 80.
Example: sample@company.com

phoneNumber.description:
Specify contact phone number.
Minimum length is 10 and supports maximum of 15 for certain countries using longer phone numbers.
Note: Recommended Maximum length is 15 and there's no specific validation will be done for the phone number.
Example: 918xxxxx890

phoneExtension.description:
Specify contact phone extension.
Note: Recommended length is 6. There's no specific validation for the phone extension.
Example: 1234

faxNumber.description:
Specify contact fax number.
Note: Recommended length is 15. There's no specific validation for the fax number.
Example: 1234567890

companyName.description:
Specify contact company name.
Recommended length is 35.
Note: There's no specific validation for the company name.

contact.description: Indicate the contact details of the shipper.

streetLines.description:
This is the combination of number, street name, etc.
Note: At least one line is required and streetlines more than 3 will be ignored. Empty lines should not be included. Maximum length per line is 35.
Example: [10 FedEx Parkway, Suite 302, .etc.]

city.description:
This is a placeholder for City Name.
Note: This is conditional and not required in all the requests.
Note: It is recommended for Express shipments for the most accurate ODA and OPA surcharges.
Example: Beverly Hills

stateOrProvinceCode.description:
This is a placeholder for State or Province code.
Example: CA
click here to see State or Province Code

postalCode.description:
Indicate the Postal code. This is Optional for non postal-aware countries. Maximum length is 10.
Example: 65247
click here to see Postal aware countries

countryCode.description:
This is the two-letter country code.
Maximum length is 2.
Example: US
click here to see Country codes

residential.description: Indicate whether this address is residential (as opposed to commercial).

address.description: This is detailed information on physical location. May be used as an actual physical address (place to which one could go), or as a container of address parts which should be handled as a unit (such as a city-state-ZIP combination within the U.S.).

printedLabelOrigin.description: Specifies the contact and address details of a location.

labelStockType.description:
Indicate the label stock type used.
click here to see label format types

labelRotation.description: This is applicable only to documents produced on thermal printers with roll stock.

imageType.description:
Specify the image format used for a shipping document.
click here to see label format types

labelPrintingOrientation.description: This is applicable only to documents produced on thermal printers with roll stock.

returnedDispositionDetail.description: Specify whether or not the return deposition is needed.

description: These are label specification details includes the image type, printer format, and label stock for label. Can also specify specific details such as doc-tab content, regulatory labels, and masking data on the label.
